main event: A UFO sighting was reported at Robins AFB, Georgia on 30 September 1962, involving a fast-moving object observed for approximately 2 seconds.
interesting points: The object was reported as a bright green light moving from north to south at high speed,The object was visible for only about 2 seconds,The sighting occurred during clear weather conditions with unlimited visibility,The observer was parked in an automobile when the object was first noticed,The investigation concluded that the bright light was likely due to mercury vapor street lights in the area.
witness description: Mr. John T. Taylor, a civilian radar engineer, considered reliable.
